intro.desc: GOLDEN HEALTH THIEN TAM TRADING SERVICE COMPANY LIMITED (GOLDEN HEALTH THIEN TAM CO., LTD) is a professional traditional medicine clinic operating in the field of traditional medicine diagnosis and treatment. We are committed to providing high-quality, safe and effective healthcare services to the community.

mission.title: Mission & Core Values
mission.missionDesc: We are committed to providing high-quality, safe and effective traditional medicine diagnosis and treatment services. Each patient is cared for with dedication, attentiveness and respect. We aim to contribute to protecting and improving community health through traditional medicine methods proven over generations.
values: Professional: Experienced doctors with specialized training in traditional medicine
